text: Bidoned, ki zindagii dunjo, ʙozica va sargarmi va zevar ast va faxrfurusi dar ʙaroʙari jakdigar va afzuntalaʙi dar amvolu farzandon. [In zindagi] Dar masal hamcun ʙoronest, ki gijohon [-i rujida ] az on kisovarzonro ʙa sigift meovarad; sipas [in gijohi sodoʙ] paƶmurda savad, on goh meʙini, ki zard mesavad va sipas xosok megardad va dar oxirat [nasiʙi munofiqonu kofiron] azoʙi sadid ast va [nasiʙi mu'minon] omurzisu xusnudii ilohi ast. [Dar har hol] Zindagii dunjo cize cuz [lazzatu] ʙarxurdorii foni [va fireʙanda] nest
